statements: SELECT * FROM fare_information;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information WHERE route_id = 100;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information WHERE fare_type = 'Regular' ORDER BY fare_id ASC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information WHERE amount > 50 AND route_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM fare_information WHERE route_id = 10;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type FROM fare_information WHERE fare_type LIKE 'Standard%' ORDER BY fare_id DESC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_type, amount FROM fare_information WHERE route_id = 5 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT fare_id, route_id FROM fare_information GROUP BY route_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM FareInformation;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, route_id FROM FareInformation;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, transportation_mode FROM FareInformation ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount FROM FareInformation WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Discounts WHERE discount_percentage > 0.1;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, route_id, transportation_mode FROM FareInformation WHERE fare_amount > 100 ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Discounts WHERE discount_percentage < 0.1 ORDER BY discount_percentage ASC;
SELECT fare_amount, route_id FROM FareInformation WHERE transportation_mode IN ('Train', 'Bus') AND fare_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, route_id, transportation_mode FROM FareInformation JOIN Discounts ON FareInformation.route_id = Discounts.discount_id WHERE fare_amount > 50 ORDER BY fare_amount ASC, discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, route_id, transportation_mode FROM FareInformation WHERE fare_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM Discounts WHERE discount_percentage > 0.2) ORDER BY fare_id ASC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, vehicle_type, route_id FROM fare_information;
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE start_date = '2022-05-01';
SELECT payment_id, ticket_id, payment_amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_amount < 100;
SELECT fare_id, vehicle_type, fare_amount, route_id FROM fare_information ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE discount_amount > 50 ORDER BY discount_amount ASC;
SELECT fare_amount, vehicle_type FROM fare_information WHERE route_id = 5 ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE discount_amount > 10 AND discount_type = 'Percentage' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, vehicle_type, route_id FROM fare_information WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Bus', 'Train') AND fare_amount < 50;
SELECT fare_id, route_id, fare_amount FROM fare_information WHERE fare_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fare_information;
SELECT fare_id, route_id, fare_amount FROM fare_information WHERE discount_id = 1;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, discount_id, route_id FROM fare_information ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, payment_id, ticket_type FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_status = 'valid';
SELECT fare_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT fare_id, route_id, fare_amount, discount_id FROM fare_information;
SELECT ticket_id, payment_id, ticket_type, ticket_status FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_status='Active';
SELECT t.payment_id, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date, t.ticket_type, t.ticket_status FROM ticketing t JOIN payment_processing p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;
SELECT fi.fare_id, fi.route_id, fi.fare_amount, d.discount_percentage, d.discount_description FROM fare_information fi JOIN discounts d ON fi.discount_id = d.discount_id;

SELECT t.ticket_id, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date, ti.ticket_type, ti.ticket_status, d.discount_percentage FROM ticketing t JOIN payment_processing p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id JOIN ticketing ti ON p.payment_id = ti.payment_id JOIN fare_information fi ON ti.payment_id = fi.fare_id JOIN discounts d ON fi.discount_id = d.discount_id WHERE d.discount_percentage > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM fare_information;
SELECT fare_amount, Transportation_mode FROM fare_information WHERE fare_amount > 50;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM fare_information WHERE Transportation_mode = 'Bus';
SELECT * FROM payment_processing ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT discount_type, discount_percentage FROM discounts WHERE applicable_transportation = 'Train';
SELECT * FROM fare_information ORDER BY fare_amount DESC, Transportation_mode ASC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, start_location, end_location FROM fare_information WHERE Transportation_mode = 'Bus';
SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_method, u.user_id FROM payment_processing p INNER JOIN payment_processing u ON p.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT t.train_id, t.train_number, t.train_route, d.discount_type, d.discount_percentage FROM trains t INNER JOIN discounts d ON t.discount_id = d.discount_id;
SELECT b.bus_id, b.bus_number, b.bus_route, f.fare_amount, f.Transportation_mode FROM buses b INNER JOIN fare_information f ON b.fare_id = f.fare_id WHERE b.bus_route LIKE '%Express%';
